title: ‘फ़ेक न्यूज़’ पर शो के दौरान खुद ही फ़र्ज़ी व्हाट्सऐप मेसेज की जानकारी शेयर करने लगे सुधीर चौधरी
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim:
“Centre is doing a lot to prevent #COVID19 but there are Prophets of Doom in our country who only spread negativity, negativity, negativity. These arm chair intellectuals do not recognize the nation’s effort”

SG conitnues:

 “… a journalist had asked him – what happened to the child? He said I don’t know, I had to return home. Then the reporter asked him – how many vultures were there? He said one. The reporter said – no. There were two. One was holding the camera….”
